data.text: @JohnsonBragg @HeyTammyBruce From “Stop Asian hate” to “cancel anything and everyone Russian” in less than 2 years. Unbelievable hypocrisy

@HeyTammyBruce These nut jobs went from “stop Asian hate” to “Cancel anyone Russian” real quick now didn’t they? Hypocrites. How about just leave everyone who doesn’t have shit to do with anything the hell alone?
@HeyTammyBruce i was wondering about this NYC landmark

@HeyTammyBruce Russia is not a bad country. Russians are not bad people. They just have a bad president. We know what that's like, too.
Americans with Russian ancestry have a double whammy right now. God bless them

@HeyTammyBruce As much as I really don't want to live anywhere near New York, this makes me want to go to the Russian Tea Room for dinner and leave a very large tip. We all know what it's like to be accused of being Putin puppets and sympathizers.
@HeyTammyBruce Of course they're gonna kill it... It speaks out against communism
@HeyTammyBruce Well I just went to their site, and apologized to them that there are people that would hate them because it is now politically acceptable.
@HeyTammyBruce We have a lot of stupid people in our country.

@HeyTammyBruce https://t.co/qCjOqlr7bV
take a look here Tammy, these people are doing some really bad things in Ukraine
